meanings.definition: The act of making something Arabic in character or style.
meanings.sent1: The arabicization of the menu at the restaurant brought in more customers.
meanings.sent2: The arabicization of the music gave it a unique and cultural touch.
meanings.sent3: The arabicization of the traditional dance made everyone laugh with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her room underwent arabicization, transforming into a Middle Eastern oasis.
meanings.sent5: The arabicization of the artwork made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: The process of incorporating Arabic language or culture into something.
meanings.sent1: The school's arabicization program introduced students to Arabic traditions.
meanings.sent2: The arabicization of the literature added depth and richness to the story.
meanings.sent3: The arabicization of the fashion show was a delightful cultural fusion.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a beautiful arabicization of poetry and emotion.
meanings.sent5: The arabicization of the festival brought a new sense of unity and diversity.

meanings.definition: The transformation of something to conform to Arabic norms or standards.
meanings.sent1: The arabicization of the architecture reflected a blend of modern and traditional styles.
meanings.sent2: The arabicization of the cuisine added authentic flavors to the menu.
meanings.sent3: The arabicization of the movie set was a creative nod to Arabic culture.
meanings.sent4: Her garden underwent a magical arabicization, blooming with exotic plants.
meanings.sent5: The arabicization of the language course made learning Arabic more engaging.
